\l to list databases
\dt for tables
\du for listing users

npx prisma studio
npx prisma migrate dev --name ANY_NAME

# Clear ts-node cache and generated files
rm -rf node_modules/.cache generated

# Regenerate
npx prisma generate

# Run seed
npm run seed


# RESETS database
npx prisma migrate reset

... FOR NEW Users
First Install PostgreSQL
setup superuser
generate
migrate
seed 

THAT's it... local data should be loaded from mock in your localdb instance..



Now how
